template.description: Concatenate the elements of a table together to form a string. Each element must be able to be coerced into a string. A separator can be specified which is placed between concatenated elements.
template.name: table.concat

template.description: Returns a shallow copy of array, i.e. the portion of the array (table) with integer keys. A variable number of additional arrays can be passed in as optional arguments. If an array has a hole (a nil entry), copying in a given source array stops at the last consecutive item prior to the hole.
template.name: table.copy

template.description: Returns the integer index of object in array. Returns 'nil' if not in array. The search goes through the length of the array as determined by #array, whose value is undefined if there are holes.
template.name: table.indexOf

template.description: Insert a given value into a table. If a position is given insert the value before the element currently at that position
template.name: table.insert

template.description: Returns the largest positive numerical index of the given table, or zero if the table has no positive numerical indices.
template.name: table.maxn

template.description: Removes an element from a table.
template.name: table.remove
